mapper.insert: insert into hw_board values(hw_board_seq.nextval, #{class_idx}, #{user_idx}, #{hw_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hw_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hw_startdate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{hw_enddate, jdbcType=DATE}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select hw_idx, class_idx, user_idx, hw_title, hw_content, hw_startdate, hw_enddate, hw_writedate from hw_board where hw_idx = #{hw_idx}
select hw_idx, class_idx, user_idx, hw_title, hw_content, hw_startdate, hw_enddate, hw_writedate from hw_board where hw_idx > 0
mapper.update: update hw_board set hw_title = #{hw_title}, hw_content = #{hw_content}, hw_startdate = #{hw_startdate}, hw_enddate = #{hw_enddate}, hw_writedate = sysdate where hw_idx = #{hw_idx}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, hw_title, hw_startdate, hw_enddate, hw_idx from (select * from hw_board where hw_idx >0 order by hw_idx desc)) where rnum between #{page} and 10
select * from (select rownum rnum, hw_title, hw_startdate, hw_enddate, hw_idx from (select * from hw_board where hw_idx >0 order by hw_idx desc)) where rnum between #{pageStart} and #{perPageNum}
select * from (select rownum rnum, hw_title, hw_startdate, hw_enddate, hw_idx from (select * from hw_board where hw_idx >0 order by hw_idx desc)) where rnum between #{pageStart} and #{perPageNum}
select count(hw_idx) from hw_board where hw_idx > 0
